summary: CAR HAS STALLED TWICE IN TRAFFIC..ONE INSTANCE TRAVELING 65 MPH ON INTERSTATE... OTHER TIME WHILE MAKING A LEFT TURN IN TRAFFIC...BOTH TIMES COLLISIONS WERE BARELY AVOIDED.  I HAVE RECEIVED RECALL 16B32 ON VEHICLE.  AM CONCERNED WHETHER IT IS AN IMPROVED VERSION, OR JUST THE SAME THROTTLE BODY.  THIS CONDITION CREATES SOME VERY DANGEROUS  SITUATIONS.
